trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <see langword="<input type= button>" />, <see langword="<input type= submit>" />, and <see langword="<input type= reset>" /> elements on the server.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> class to create button controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>类，以创建在网页上的按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: An `<input type=button>` HTML element is a push button with no default behavior when clicked.
trans-unit.target: `<input type=button>` HTML 元素是一个具有任何默认行为时单击推送按钮。

trans-unit.source: An `<input type=submit>` HTML element is a button that submits a form when clicked.
trans-unit.target: `<input type=submit>` HTML 元素是提交表单时单击的按钮。

trans-unit.source: An `<input type=reset>` HTML button resets all controls to their initial values when clicked.
trans-unit.target: `<input type=reset>` HTML 按钮可重置为其初始值单击时所有控件。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET 2.0, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> class to create Reset and Submit buttons, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 2.0 中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>类和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>类，以分别创建重置和提交按钮。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control to create a command button, a Submit button, and a Reset button.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件创建命令按钮、 提交按钮和重置按钮。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> class using default values.
The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The "button" literal string.
trans-unit.target: "Button"文字字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control using the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控制使用默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The input button type.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> class using the specified button type.
The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The value of the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `type` 参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different possible values for the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的不同可能值`type`参数。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: A command button.
trans-unit.target: 命令按钮。

trans-unit.source: A button that submits the form to the server.
trans-unit.target: 提交到服务器窗体的按钮。

trans-unit.source: A button that clears the form.
trans-unit.target: 清除窗体上一个按钮。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control using the overloaded constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控制使用重载构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> control is clicked.
<see langword="true" /> if validation is performed when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> control is clicked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在单击 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> 控件后执行验证，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，执行页验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定由验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件。

trans-unit.source: You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control is clicked by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>通过单击控件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To prevent validation from being performed, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用在事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>事件，以防止在单击取消或重置按钮时出现的页验证。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A> property to prevent page validation from occurring.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性以防止在发生的页验证。

trans-unit.source: Notice how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A> method activates each validation control independently.
trans-unit.target: 请注意如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>方法单独激活每个验证控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> event and registers client script for generating postback.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.OnPreRender%2A> method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.OnPreRender%2A>方法重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.OnPreRender%2A> is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.OnPreRender%2A> 主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.OnPreRender%2A> method so that it always displays a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control with bold text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.OnPreRender%2A>方法，以便它始终显示自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>具有粗体文本控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick" /> event.
This allows you to handle the event directly.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event is raised when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>引发事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: A Reset button does not raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 重置按钮不会引发<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler adds the values of the two text boxes on the page and displays the results.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序将页上添加两个文本框中的值，并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
Raises events for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> control when it posts back to the server.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control, when it is clicked, to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法由<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件，它被单击时，引发<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called using the group of controls specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性是`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用控件中指定组的调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员扩展的功能使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
Renders the attributes into the specified writer and then calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" /> method.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RenderAttributes%2A> method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RenderAttributes%2A>方法重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.RenderAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>基方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RenderAttributes%2A> is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RenderAttributes%2A> 主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.OnPreRender%2A> method in a custom server control so that specific title text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.OnPreRender%2A>方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便为始终显示为工具提示，可访问的特定标题文本<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> control is clicked on the Web page.
This event is raised when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 将引发此事件时<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件被单击。

trans-unit.source: A Reset button does not raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 重置按钮不会引发<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ServerClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler adds the values of the two text boxes on the page and displays the results.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序将页上添加两个文本框中的值，并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents an optional event argument to be passed to the event handler.

Implements the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" /> method by calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" /> method.
Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The group of controls for which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" /> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 为其控件组的<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton" />控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: 每个验证组从其他页上的验证组可以独立进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来为其指定验证组的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才起作用时，才的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A>属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for this property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定此属性的值与<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the controls to validate when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton.ValidationGroup%2A>属性来指定要验证时的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>控件回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank.
trans-unit.target: 页面包含用于捕获从用户的数据的两个文本框和两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>控件以确保用户未将一个文本框留空。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>控件中的第一个文本框是`CityInfoGroup`验证组和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>控件中的第二个框是`StateInfoGroup`验证组。

trans-unit.source: When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated.
trans-unit.target: 当`CityQueryButton`单击后，仅在控件`CityInfoGroup`验证组进行验证。

trans-unit.source: When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated.
trans-unit.target: 当`StateQueryButton`单击后，仅在控件`StateInfoGroup`验证组进行验证。
